Sprunki 456 Squid Cookie

April 13, 2025 Tags: 2 Player, 2 Player Games, 2D, Adventure, Arcade, Sprunki, squid, squidgame
The Sprunki brothers have invaded the entire forest and theyre everywhere. You must help the turquoise and red-suited brothers to reach the cash register as quickly as possible. Help all the brothers. Collect the cookies and reach the cash register. Throw cookies at the Sprunki brothers and defeat them.

The Sprunki brothers have invaded the entire forest and theyre everywhere. You must help the turquoise and red-suited brothers to reach the cash register as quickly as possible. Help all the brothers. Collect the cookies and reach the cash register. Throw cookies at the Sprunki brothers and defeat them.
